items.title: The Game Awards Amazon game sale up to 60% off: DK Bananza, Silent Hill f, Mario Wonder, AC Shadows, more
items.summary:
The 2025 Game Awards aired last night, with new world premieres for Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic, a compile remake/re-imagining of the original Tomb Raider game, and all-new Tomb Raider Catalyst reveal, and a whole bunch more. A big congrats goes out to the Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 who absolutely dominated the awards part of the show, and is deservingly taking home the Game of the Year hardware for 2025, but for now we are focused on the Amazon Game Awards sale that is live for another 11 hours or so. We featured it last night on social, but there are still some wonderful deals up for grabs, including everything from actual console games to a whole host of battelstation hardware – we have sprinkled in a few other notable game deals landing this morning as well:

  • Donkey Kong Bananza Digital $59.50 (Reg. $70)
  • Donkey Kong Bananza + DK Island & Emerald Rush $76.50 (Reg. $90)
  • Super Mario Bros. Wonder $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Battlefield 6 $59.50 (Reg. $70)
  • Silent Hill f $45 (Reg. $70)
  • ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN $30 (Reg. $55)
  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows$28 (Reg. $70)
  • Split Fiction – Nintendo Switch 2 $30 (Reg. $50)
  • Star Wars Outlaws Gold Edition – Nintendo Switch 2 $40 (Reg. $60)
  • And even more…

Today only: The 2025 Game Awards Amazon flash sale now live at up to 53% off – Gaming gear, consoles, collectibles, more

Amazon Game Awards flash sale: Samsung’s 27-inch QHD QD-OLED 180Hz Odyssey gaming monitor at $360 all-time low

items.title: Less New York, more Nashville: Europeans head to smaller US cities
items.summary: NEW YORK/LONDON, Dec 12 (Reuters) - European travelers, nearly a year into President Donald Trump's administration, are popping up in less-heralded - and often more affordable - destinations in the U.S. like Tennessee, Montana and Idaho, while skipping hot spots like New York and Washington D.C. items.title: Reddit argues it isn’t like other social platforms in case against Australia’s social media ban
items.summary: Reddit, one of the world's largest social platforms, is arguing that it doesn't meet the definition of "social media platforms" as it seeks to overturn Australia's law banning children under 16 years of age from social media.

items.title: Swiss to reduce F-35 fighter jet order from US as costs rise
items.summary: ZURICH, Dec 12 (Reuters) - Switzerland said on Friday it would reduce the number of Lockheed Martin F-35A Lightning II fighter jets it is buying from the United States so it can stick to the original budget plan after the cost of the order rose. Read full story

items.title: Still no deal on European fighter jets after ministerial talks, sources say
items.summary: BERLIN/PARIS, Dec 12 (Reuters) - Defence ministers from Germany, France and Spain have pushed discussions on a troubled European fighter jets project towards government leaders meeting next week after inconclusive talks in Berlin, people briefed on the matter said. Read full story

items.title: Euroclear can offset its assets seized by Russia with Russia's assets -EU
items.summary: BRUSSELS, Dec 12 (Reuters) - Belgian central securities depository Euroclear, which holds most of the Russian central bank assets frozen in Europe, can offset any seizure of its assets in Russia as a result of lawsuits with the Russian assets it holds in Belgium, a senior EU officials said. Read full story

items.title: Amazon Game Awards flash sale: Samsung’s 27-inch QHD QD-OLED 180Hz Odyssey gaming monitor at $360 all-time low
items.summary:
Today only, as part of the ongoing Game Awards flash sale, Amazon is offering Samsung’s Odyssey 27-inch QD-OLED gaming monitor for $359.99 shipped. This fairly new monitor launched in October at $550 and dipped to $400 for Black Friday. Today’s flash deal offer shaves an additional $40 off that price to mark a new best price to beat. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this monitor, and you can learn more about it in detail below along with deals on other monitors and gaming gear.

items.title: Zelenskiy visits Kupiansk as Ukraine retakes parts of frontline town
items.summary: KYIV, Dec 12 (Reuters) - Ukrainian forces said they had retaken parts of the northeastern town of Kupiansk and had encircled Russian troops there as President Volodymyr Zelenskiy visited the area and praised the operation, saying it strengthened Ukraine diplomatically. items.title: Dozens of migrants brought to Malta after boat capsizes

An interview with Nikita Bier, who wants to lure journalists back to X with a rebuilt recommendation algorithm with no keyword suppression or manual downranking  —  Product chief Nikita Bier on journalists who left: “We have to earn their trust.”  Also: Fidji Simo on OpenAI's Code Red, and a new episode of ACCESS.

The move marks Capital A’s first major step into regulated digital assets and positions both companies to test how an MYR-backed token […]

items.summary:
Igor Bonifacic / Engadget:
In his EO, Trump orders US AG Pam Bondi to create an “AI Litigation Task Force” that meets regularly with David Sacks to challenge “inconsistent” state AI laws  —  The administration will also attempt to prevent states with “onerous” AI laws from accessing broadband funding.

items.title: Save up to $200 on Autel’s latest outdoor cams with solar panels, local storage, HDMI, more – at new lows from $156
items.summary:
The official Autel Amazon storefront is giving us even more savings than ever on its new 2-cam Outdoor Wireless Solar Security Camera kit at $156 shipped, which isn’t offered directly from the brand, while the 4-cam kit is down at $199 shipped, and does match its direct pricing. A new branch of Autel’s devices, these models have spent the time since their release in August through October keeping to their $299 and $399 price tags, which we’ve been seeing steadily ramping up discounts since early Black Friday sales. First they received cuts to $249 and $299, with the 2-cam pack then going lower to $199, while the 4-cam dropped to $254. Today’s deal brings larger-than-ever $143 and $200 markdowns off their full tag rates, landing them at new all-time low prices just in time to score them ahead of Christmas.

items.title: Ford and SK On are ending their US battery joint venture
